original_text: And he was transfigured before them, and his face shone like the sun, and his clothes became white as light.
korean_text: 그들 앞에서 변형되사 그 얼굴이 해 같이 빛나며 옷이 빛과 같이 희어졌더라

sentences.original_text: And he was transfigured before them
and his face shone like the sun
and his clothes became white as light.
